TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program KSC Time Lapse

Articles.Content:
I made this tonight i hope you enjoy.

The music suits the video and the atmosphere of the unknown of where that rocket will go on the launch pad.
Is anyone interested on me making some more?
Kinda boring. Sit there for 3 minutes watching kerbin move.
Thanks for the feedback i might do one that does the whole solar system in a short video.
I would have done an overhead view at a higher speed, with some tilt-shift if possible. Otherwise it looks cool!
Yea i will do that next time. Maybe one for each planet seeing as though i have quite a few ideas that i can do.
